title: CDisplayEx Version 1.9.13 Comic Book Reader for Windows x86/x64
description:
CDisplayEx is a comic book reader based on CDisplay. It is able to read all comic book formats (cbr, cbz, cbt, cb7, pdf, and djvu).  It loads comic books much faster than CDisplay 1.8.

After CDisplayEx is installed, you will be prompted to install four applications not related to CDisplayEx, just click "Decline" to not install them.

Both the 32-bit and 64-bit versions are included in this torrent:
CDisplayExWin32_1.9.13.exe for 32-bit operating systems
CDisplayExWin64_1.9.13.exe for 64-bit operating systems

Release notes:
1.9.13

+ Support for the Leap Motion
+ Handle additional mouse buttons to load next file or previous file.
+ Option to automatically load next file once you reach the end of the current file.
+ Loading a folder now also search images in sub folders.
+ Galician language support.
+ Fix some rare bugs.
